price: ئەوەی خوا دەیھێڵتەوە (لەقازانجی حەڵاڵ) چاکترە بۆتان ئەگەر ئێوە بڕوادارن و من پارێزەر نیم بەسەرتانەوە
arabic: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: baqiyyatu al-lahi khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minīna wamā anā ʿalaykum biḥafīẓin
